title: 开服就蹦
author: 逗笔~
txt_content:
Starting server!09.02 11:20:21 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "kcauldron1.6.4(有插件有mod)"09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x00000000ad000000, 20971520000, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO #09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (mmap) failed to map 20971520000 bytes for committing reserved memory.09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:09.02 11:20:22 [Server] INFO # /hs_err_pid196710.log09.02 11:20:22 [Multicraft] Server shut down (starting)09.02 11:20:22 [Multicraft] Not restarting server due to server file settings.09.02 11:20:22 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 109.02 11:20:22 [Multicraft] Server stopped这是错误报告
每次开服 就自动关
求大神解答急！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

replies.author: Qian_Xia1314
replies.txt_content: 本地分配内存不足 需要在多分配一下内存 不然启动不了

replies.author: Qian_Xia1314
replies.txt_content: 在本地服务器内存设置能4G或者6G就行了
